mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invitation (team_id, inviter_id, invitee_id, token, status, expired_at, created_at) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{inviterId}, #{inviteeId}, #{token}, #{status}, #{expiredAt}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE invitation SET status = #{status}, responded_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.team_id, i.invitee_id, i.status, i.created_at, i.responded_at, u.email AS inviteeEmail, u.nickname AS inviteeName, u.profile_img AS inviteeProfile_img FROM invitation i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.invitee_id = u.id WHERE i.team_id = #{teamId}

SELECT i.id, i.team_id, i.inviter_id, i.status, i.created_at, u.email AS inviterEmail, u.nickname AS inviterName, u.profile_img AS inviterProfile_img, t.name AS teamName FROM invitation i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.inviter_id = u.id LEFT JOIN team t ON i.team_id = t.id WHERE i.invitee_id = #{userId} AND i.status = 'PENDING'
